Package Controller

Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
Controller.OrderController
public class OrderController extends Object
Represents the control class to create, update or remove room service orders.
Since:
2022-04-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mary Soh

    • createOrder

      public static void createOrder(String roomNum)
      Creates an Order with the status CONFIRMED with no order items yet.
      Parameters:
      roomNum - the room number that the room service order belongs to.

    • addOrderItem

      public static void addOrderItem(int index, int foodID, String remarks, int quantity, double price)
      Adds an order item into an Order in the ArrayList of Orders.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the Order object in the ArrayList of Orders to be changed.
      foodID - the index+1 of the menu item in the ArrayList of MenuItems in MenuController to be added.
      remarks - Remarks of the order item.
      quantity - Number of the order item to be added.
      price - Current price of the menu item to be added.

    • searchDeliveredOrder

      public static int searchDeliveredOrder(String roomNumber)
      Finds the index of the first order in the ArrayList of Orders that has the status of DELIVERED, returns -1 if not found.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - Room number whose order is to be found.
      Returns:
      the index of the Order in the ArrayList of Orders.

    • searchPreparingOrder

      public static int searchPreparingOrder(String roomNum)
      Finds the index of the first order in the ArrayList of Orders that has the status of PREPARING, returns -1 if not found.
      Parameters:
      roomNum - Room number whose order is to be found.
      Returns:
      the index of the Order in the ArrayList of Orders.

      public static void updateOrderItemRemarks(int index, int foodID, String remarks)
      Changes the remarks of a specific order item of a specific order.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the specific order in the ArrayList of Orders.
      foodID - index+1 of the order item in the ArrayList of OrderItems in a specific Order.
      remarks - remarks to be changed to.

      Parameters:
      index - index of the specific order in the ArrayList of Orders.
      itemChoice - index+1 of the order item in the ArrayList of OrderItems in a specific Order.
      quantity - new quantity of the order item.

    • displayAllOrders

      public static void displayAllOrders()
      Prints all orders existing.

    • initOrders

      public static void initOrders()
      This method initialize all the values of the attributes of the Order and OrderItem classes and creates OrderItem objects and Order objects. We extract the values from the data in our guest database as the value of each attribute is separated by '@'. It then adds those OrderItem created into orderItemList in the Order class, our array list of order items. Then the Order objects created will be added into OrderList in this OrderController, our array list of orders.

    • saveOrders

      public static void saveOrders()
      This method reads the values of the attributes in our database. Each line in our database corresponds to a different order and order items and this function is able to read all the lines in our database to extract those values.

    • displayMenu

      public static void displayMenu()
      Displays all menu items.

      public static double getMenuItemPrice(int index)
      Gets the price of a specific menu item.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the price of the specific menu item.

      Checks if a Room Number exists.
      Parameters:
      roomNum - the room number to be checked.
      Returns:
      Whether the room exists or not.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Whether the food ID exists or not.

    • checkRoomHasOrder

      public static int checkRoomHasOrder(int index, String roomNum)
      Checks if a specific room has a specific order.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the Order in the ArrayList of Orders.
      roomNum - room number of the room.
      Returns:
      the index of the Order in the ArrayList of Orders, -1 if not found.

    • getOrder

      Returns:
      the specific order.

    • removeOrderItem

      public static void removeOrderItem(int index, int itemChoice)
      Remove an order item in a specific order.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the specific order in the ArrayList of Orders.
      itemChoice - index of the order item in the ArrayList of Order items in the Order.

    • calTotalBill

      public static double calTotalBill(String roomNum)
      This method calculates the total room service bill for a room. If the room has multiple orders, the bills of the individual orders will be added. This is assuming that all orders have been delivered before checkout.
      Parameters:
      roomNum - This is the room number of the room to calculate bill for.
      Returns:
      The total bill of all orders of that room.
